TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SendActivity extends System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity
Public NotInheritable Class SendActivity Inherits Activity

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 建立 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服務作業同步版本之模型的用戶活動。

span.span: Client activity that models the synchronous invocation of a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 活動可讓您使用預先定義的訊息交換模式的 WCF 服務參與對話。The activity enables you to participate in a conversation with a WCF service using a predefined message exchange pattern. > [!NOTE] > 是封鎖活動，也就是說，直到活動完成執行前，工作流程的執行都是封鎖狀態。The activity is a blocking activity, meaning that workflow execution is blocked until the activity completes execution. 活動支援的訊息交換模式包括︰The message exchange patterns supported by the activity include: - 單向傳送訊息One-way Send Message 活動傳送訊息，但不預期會從服務接收到回應。The activity sends a message but does not expect a response from the service. - 傳送要求 – 接收回覆Send Request - Receive Reply 活動傳送訊息並等待，直到從服務接收到回應為止。The activity sends a message and waits until a response is received from the service. - 傳送要求 – 接收錯誤Send Request - Receive Fault 活動傳送訊息並等待，直到從服務接收到回應或錯誤為止。The activity sends a message and waits until a response or a fault is received from the service. 在執行期間，傳送活動會擲回從伺服器收到的所有錯誤。During execution, the send activity throws all of the faults that were received from the server. 活動可以用來處理用戶端工作流程中的錯誤。 activities can be used to handle the faults in the client workflow. > [!NOTE] > 此活動屬於[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]。This activity is part of [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]. 之對等活動[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，請參閱。For the equivalent activity in [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], see .

summary.span: 會在從服務收到回應後發生。

span.span: Occurs after the response has been received from the service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 與此事件相關聯的事件處理常式，可用於讀取來自叫用的服務作業之傳回值。This event handler associated with this event can be used to read the return value from the service operation invoked. ## Examples 下列範例顯示如何使用 `AfterResponse` 事件。The following example shows how to use the `AfterResponse` event. [!code-csharp[SendActivity#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/sendactivity/cs/snippets.cs#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly AfterResponseEvent As DependencyProperty

summary.span: 表示目標為 事件的 。

span.span: Represents the that targets the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此相依事件屬性，可用來將傳送活動的 事件，與工作流程類別上的公開事件處理常式繫結起來。This dependency event property can be used to bind the send activity's event to a public event handler on the workflow class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event BeforeSend As EventHandler(Of SendActivityEventArgs)

summary.span: 在 活動傳送訊息至服務之前發生。

span.span: Occurs before the activity sends the message to the service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 與此事件相關聯的事件處理常式，可用於設定正在叫用的服務作業之參數值。This event handler associated with this event can be used to set the parameter values for the service operation being invoked. > [!NOTE] > 的內容無法在此事件處理常式中設定。The context of a cannot be set in this event handler. ## Examples 下列範例顯示如何使用 `BeforeSend` 事件。The following example shows how to use the `BeforeSend` event. 這個範例是改自 `Conversations` SDK 範例。This example was adapted from the `Conversations` SDK sample. [!code-csharp[SendActivity#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/sendactivity/cs/snippets.cs#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Workflow::Activities::ChannelToken ^ ChannelToken { System::Workflow::Activities::ChannelToken ^ get(); void set(System::Workflow::Activities::ChannelToken ^ value); };
member this.ChannelToken : System.Workflow.Activities.ChannelToken with get, set

summary.span: 用來將自身與用戶端通道建立關聯的 。

span.span: used by the to associate itself with a client channel.

value.span: 定義一個用戶端通道，而 會使用此通道與服務進行通訊。

span.span: A defining a client channel that a uses to communicate with a service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通道權杖會指定通道名稱、通道範圍與端點組態名稱，以用來建立通道。A channel token specifies the name of the channel, the scope of the channel, and the endpoint configuration name to be used in establishing the channel. 組態檔內的端點名稱具有服務的位址、繫結與合約資訊 (此服務為 活動的通訊對象)。The endpoint name in the configuration file has the address, binding, and contract information for a service that the activity communicates with. 通道權杖亦指定唯一的通道名稱，以及權杖的擁有者活動名稱。The channel token also specifies a unique channel name and an owner activity name for the token. 若有多個傳送活動想使用相同端點與服務進行通訊，則通道權杖可與這些傳送活動共用。A channel token can be shared between multiple send activities that want to use the same endpoint to communicate with a service. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何存取 `ChannelToken` 屬性。The following example shows how to access the `ChannelToken` property. 這個範例是改自 `CalculatorClient` SDK 範例。This example was adapted from the `CalculatorClient` SDK sample. [!code-csharp[SendActivity#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/sendactivity/cs/snippets.cs#7)]

summary.span: 傳回一個字典，內含用戶端與通訊的服務之間的通訊所使用文字，包括相互關聯識別。

span.span: Returns a dictionary that contains the context used for communication between the client and the service it is communicating with, including such things as identification for correlation.

value.span: 以字典為基礎的集合，內含 關鍵字及其關聯的 值。

span.span: A dictionary-based collection that contains keys and their associated values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 內容資訊，是用戶端及其所通訊的服務之間所使用的通訊，包括相互關聯的識別。Context information is used for communication between the client and the service it is communicating with and includes such things as identification for correlation. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何存取 `Context` 屬性。The following example shows how to access the `Context` property. 這個範例是改自 `CalculatorClient` SDK 範例。This example was adapted from the `CalculatorClient` SDK sample. summary.span: 取得或設定用來與服務通訊的自訂位址。

span.span: Gets or sets the custom address used to communicate with a service.

value.span: 字串值，其值為服務正在接聽的位址。

span.span: String value whose value is the address a service is listening on.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若有此值，則此值會用來定義作業的端點位址。If present, this value is used to define the endpoint address for the operation. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何存取 `CustomAddress` 屬性。The following example shows how to access the `CustomAddress` property. 這個範例是改自 `CalculatorClient` SDK 範例。This example was adapted from the `CalculatorClient` SDK sample. [!code-csharp[SendActivity#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/sendactivity/cs/snippets.cs#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void InitializeProperties() cil managed
Public ReadOnly Property ParameterBindings As WorkflowParameterBindingCollection

summary.span: 取得在 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服務的型式參數清單中找到之可繫結參數的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of bindable parameters as found in the Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service's formal parameter list.
The of parameters to bind to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可用來指定服務作業參數與工作流程之公開欄位和屬性之間的繫結 (此工作流程包含 活動)。 can be used to specify bindings between the service operation parameters and public field and properties of the workflow that contains the activity. 當 活動執行時，會從其繫結的工作流程屬性讀取對應的參數值，並當做服務作業參數傳送給服務。When the activity executes, the corresponding parameter values are read from the workflow properties they are bound to and are sent to the service as service operation parameters. 亦可用來從服務作業擷取傳回值。 can also be used to retrieve the return values from a service operation. 所有服務作業參數均應繫結。All parameters of the service operation should be bound. 未繫結的服務作業參數會產生編譯器警告，且叫用 時會傳送參數的預設值。Unbound service operation parameters produce compiler warnings and the default values of the parameter are sent when the is invoked. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何存取 `ParameterBindings` 屬性。The following example shows how to access the `ParameterBindings` property. 這個範例是改自 `Conversations` SDK 範例。This example was adapted from the `Conversations` SDK sample. [!code-csharp[SendActivity#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/sendactivity/cs/snippets.cs#0)]

summary.span: 屬性名稱，此名稱可用於服務傳送的傳回值 (該服務是 活動的通訊對象)。

span.span: Name of the property that is used for the return value sent by the service that the activity is communicating with.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字串可用來從擷取來自 事件處理常式中與 活動關聯之 的傳回值。This string can be used to retrieve the return value from the associated with the activity in the event handler. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何存取 `ReturnValuePropertyName` 欄位。The following example shows how to access the `ReturnValuePropertyName` field. [!code-csharp[SendActivity#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/sendactivity/cs/snippets.cs#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Workflow::Activities::TypedOperationInfo ^ ServiceOperationInfo { System::Workflow::Activities::TypedOperationInfo ^ get(); void set(System::Workflow::Activities::TypedOperationInfo ^ value); };

summary.span: 定義 活動所通訊之服務的合約與作業。

span.span: Defines the contract and operation of the service that the activity communicates with.

value.span: 物件，此物件包含合約名稱、合約類型、作業名稱 (可能與實際方法名稱不同)、該作業是否為單向作業，以及包含作業相關參數的方法資訊。

span.span: A object that contains the contract name, the contract type, the operation name, (which may be distinct from the actual method name), whether the operation is a one-way operation, and method information including parameters about the operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 活動永遠會參照現有合約和其定義的作業。The activity always refers to an existing contract and its defined operations. 沒有允許 活動自行定義合約的規定。There is no provision that allows a activity to define a contract itself. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何存取 `ServiceOperationInfo` 屬性。The following example shows how to access the `ServiceOperationInfo` property. 這個範例是改自 `Conversations` SDK 範例。This example was adapted from the `Conversations` SDK sample. [!code-csharp[SendActivity#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/sendactivity/cs/snippets.cs#1)]

summary.span: 設定 活動的內容資訊。

span.span: Sets context information for a activity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 內容資訊，是用戶端及其所通訊的服務之間所使用的通訊，包括相互關聯的識別。Context information is used for communication between the client and the service it is communicating and includes such things as identification for correlation.
